ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 16 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D610 Digital SLR Camera with 28-300mm VR AF-S Zoom Lens, Shoulder Bag & 32GB Card + <2> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <3> Xit MB-D14 Battery Grip + <4> Spare EN-EL15 Battery +
<5> Additional Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <6> Battery Charger + <7> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <8> PD 77mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters +
<9> PD GP-1 GPS Geotag Adapter + <10> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <11> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<13> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <14> PD Spudz Microfiber Cloth + <15> LCD Screen Protectors + <16> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D610 Digital SLR Camera with 28-300mm VR AF-S Zoom Lens, Shoulder Bag & 32GB Card with 64GB Card + Flash + Grip + 2 Batteries & Charger + Filter Kit
